text:
25 New Bowery, at the S. E. corner of Madison Street, showing a three story structure at that location. This bears No. 20 on the Madison Street side. Occupants are the Grande Deposito D'Olio D'Oliva, The New Romé Importing Company. Overhead is the South Ferry Division of the Second Avenue Elevated Lines.

February 22, 1940

Gift of Beecher Ogden
title: Manhattan: New Bowery - Madison Street
